project.name: Flair
project.description: Flair is building the ultimate Web3 Infra Platform; offering building blocks to developers and founders so they can move easier and faster with integrating NFT and Web3 features into their projects, apps and games. We provide open-source building blocks for NFT and Web3 projects from Tokens, NFT Sales, Staking, to Revenue Sharing and Royalty management. These include ready-made Solidity contracts, React SDK, and easy-to-use wallet solutions.
